programme.title: Rajkumar
programme.desc: Two warring kingdoms Thambore and Araavali decide to end their enmity by marrying their children. But post a fateful incidence the kingdoms revert to rivalry. Now Araavali prince's love for Thambore's princess is their only hope to end the rivalry.

programme.title: I M 24
programme.desc: I M 24 is the story of a middle-aged man who lies to a wannabe beauty queen about his age and appearance while chatting on an online portal. Watch what happens when the girl decides to pay a personal visit to her online friend.

programme.title: A Daughter's Tale: Pankh
programme.desc: Vidya moves out of her house after she is asked by her in-laws to abort her second unborn girl child. Years later, one of her daughters who grows up to become an ace lawyer, decides to fight a case against her own father.

programme.title: Deewaar: Let's Bring Our Heroes Home
programme.desc: A group of Indian POW (Prisoners of War) from the 1971 Indo-Pak war rebels against the Pakistani army and tries to escape from their captivity. Helping the group in the mission is Gaurav, the son of a former Army Major also held captive by the enemy.

programme.title: The Legend of Bhagat Singh
programme.desc: During the British Raj, upon witnessing the atrocities of the British, Bhagat Singh grows up to be a fierce freedom fighter. His publicised ideas of revolution bring him to as much popularity as Mahatma Gandhi amongst Indians.
